frameDefinitions: A Place is located far off from centers of population, culture, and/or trade.
A Figure is characterized as near the Ground, according to some contextually given scale.
A Prisoner is punished for committing a Crime by being confined to a Prison for a specified period of time.
A Self_mover intentionally moves in a Directionon a Path relative to landmark that is neither the Source nor the Goal of the overall motion.
The Authorities hold a Suspect under suspicion of having committed a crime (Charges).
The words in this frame have to do with people and the personal Relationships they are or can be a part of.
frameExamples: She put her shoes <t>under</t> the table .
Ambrose Powell <t>forded</t> over on one horse, and we drove the others after him.
The police <t>held</t> Mr. Smith in the slammer on charges of killing his lawyer.
And of course that drippy <t><fex name='Partner_1'>boyfriend</fex></t> of hers backed her up.
listRoleDefinitions: The town or area that is in a remote location.
The <fen>Ground</fen> serves as a basis for describing the location of the <fen>Figure</fen>.
The <fen>Figure</fen> is perceived as located relative to a certain <fen>Ground</fen> location. The figure can be an entity or an event.
The period of time during which the locative relation between <fen>Figure</fen> and <fen>Ground</fen> obtains.
The <fen>Prisoner</fen> is held in custody as a punishment for having committed a crime.
The facility where the <fen>Prisoner</fen> is held.
The <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Prisoner</fen> is in prison.
This role identifies the general <fen>Place</fen> where the <fen>Prisoner</fen> is held captive.
This is a sentient being or a vehicle steered by a sentient being which moves.
Any expression which implies a definite starting-point of motion expresses the frame element <fen>Source</fen>.
Any description of a trajectory of motion which is neither a <fen>Source</fen> nor a <fen>Goal</fen> expresses the frame element <fen>Path</fen>, excluding directional expressions:
Any expression which indicates where the <fen>Self_mover</fen> ends up as a result of the motion expresses the frame element <fen>Goal</fen>.
The configuration formed by the entire <fen>Path</fen> of the <fen>Self_mover</fen>, taken simultaneously.
The direction in which the <fen>Self_mover</fen> goes.
The time at which the motion takes place.
The <fen>Place</fen> is where the motion (which is specified by a <fen>Source</fen>, <fen>Path</fen> or <fen>Goal</fen>) is located.
The <fen>Authorities</fen> hold the <fen>Suspect</fen> in custody.
This role identifies the person who is taken into custody and held, under suspicion of having committed a crime.
When the detaining occurs.
Where the detaining takes place.
That partner in the <fen>Relationship</fen> who is realized as the subject of verbs in active form sentences, or of adjectives in predicative uses.
That partner in the <fen>Relationship</fen> who is not expressed as the external argument.
The joint construal of both <fen>Partners</fen> in the <fen>Relationship</fen>.
listRoleExamples: He lives in the <fex><t>backwoods</t></fex> of Canada.
The cat is next to <fex>the mat</fex>.
<fex>The cat</fex> is next to the mat.
He was by the park <fex>on Friday</fex>.
<fex>We</fex> drive down dusty roads, forded through a stream, and tried to get up a mountainside on a rocky road.
We forded <fex>from the island</fex> to the mainland.
We decided to cut <fex>through the forest</fex>.
I'll cut across the Sahara desert <fex>up to Algeria and Morocco</fex>.
We followed the trail (which is well marked with cairns) and then cut <fex>west</fex> across a grassy meadow for about 1000 feet to the crest of  the nearby saddle lying below North Peak.
The Federal Army of the Potomac forded the river <fex>in August 1862</fex>.
The common brook is best forded <fex>south of the hut</fex>.

passageCandidateSpans.text: Ernestine: A Granddaughter Uncovers the Secret History of Her American Family"

sourceCandidateSpans.text: Repossessing Ernestine: The Search for a Lost Soul
